title: Pokemon: Pikachu to Eievui Friends (Pokemon: Eevee and Friends)
synopsis: The 25th Pikachu short, set to premiere alongside the 16th movie of the Pokemon franchise, "Pokemon Best Wishes! Season 2: Shinsoku no Genosect".
related_anime: ['Pokemon Best Wishes! Season 2: Decolora Adventure', 'Pokemon Movie 16: Shinsoku no Genosect - Mewtwo Kakusei']
